title: Pea, prawn and avocado salad
ingredients: ['4 avocados, halved lengthwise and pitted', '1 lemon, juiced', '65g cooked small prawns', '100g frozen petite peas, thawed', '30g black olives, chopped', '40g sweet onion, finely diced', '30g celery, finely diced', '1 dash garlic powder', '1 dash onion granules', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 tablespoons mayonnaise, or as needed']
